taskDescription:
Which property of the real numbers is shown: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>4</mn>
  <mrow>
    <mo>(</mo>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mi>a</mi>
      <mo>+</mo>
      <mn>7</mn>
    </mrow>
    <mo>)</mo>
  </mrow>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>4</mn>
  <mi>a</mi>
  <mo>+</mo>
  <mn>4</mn>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mn>7</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">4\left( {a + 7} \right) = 4a + 4 \times 7</annotation></semantics></math>?
